description:
Usagi and Minako sneak off to the arcade to take a break from their life of studying. While enjoying the latest racing game, the girls are approached by a handsome student named Haruka Tenoh, who wishes to join them for a friendly match.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A Handsome Boy? Haruka Tenoh`s Secret
Suteki na Bishounen!? Ten`ou Haruka no Himitsu
素敵な美少年? 天王はるかの秘密
